General.Name: Lite Access Technologies Inc
General.Description: Lite Access Technologies Inc. manufactures, distributes, sells, and installs fiber optic technology specializing in micro-duct and air-blown fiber in Canada, and the United States. The company operates through three segments: Product, Fibre Optic Installation, and Concrete Cutting. It offers micro-duct, air-blown fiber, and micro and narrow trench installation services for use in various communication networks. The company also provides fiber-optic cables, aerial and low fire hazard micro-ducts, connectors, and sundries, as well as proprietary items, such as a cutting head, shark blades, and the LiteXtend solution, as well as breeze cable blowing machines. It serves municipal and regional governments, telecom carriers and internet service providers, first nations communities, and fibre to the home/premises, as well as intelligent traffic control, healthcare, point to point, and education networks. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Surrey, Canada.
General.Address: 20108 Logan Avenue, Langley, BC, Canada, V3A 4L6
